ygData.subject: Re: Footloose and fancy free...
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve heard that Kobald hide boots are good.  They give a AGI, and a HP bonus, but don t quote me on that.  I think they are found in Guk somewhere. I never
ygData.messageBody:
I've heard that Kobald hide boots are good. They give a AGI, and a HP
bonus, but don't quote me on that. I think they are found in Guk somewhere.
I never seem they myself, that's just what i heard soemwhere.

> From: Aaron Braunstein <aaron_spam@...>
>
> Well, I've been on a big armor-upgrade kick lately, when it
> occurred to me that I am still walking around in the same ol' footwear
that
> I've had since... well, forever. It's like walking around in the beat up
> blue Keds you had back in 2nd grade. Seeing as there is no 'mesh boots'
or
> anything of that ilk, I was wondering what was out there that was
> monk-friendly (i.e. low weight). AC is obviouly desireable, although
> anything that could offer other bonuses (stat increase, resistances, etc.)
> would be wonderful.
> Suggestions, advices, personal experiences appreciated...
>
> --
> Aaron Braunstein
> Pacific Data Management, Inc.
>
